Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: KSS "KSS"
Reviews.Content: I've only used it a couple times and so far it's met my expectations.  Not sure how long it holds a charge.  Only problem is my computer (Windows XP) won't recognize it so can't download at home.

Reviews.Title: Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: Bought this as agift for my daughter, it is very simple to use.touch screen,3" screen makes it great for taking pictures. Excellent gift for her. I would recommend this camera to anybody. A+++
